cookies.accept-description: Accept the use of a web storage and proceed to the app.
cookies.cancel-description: Reject usage of a web storage and exit the app.
cookies.info-label: Opens a dialog with the frag.jetzt data protection policy.
cookies.title: Data Privacy

data-protection.cancel-description: Reject the app's privacy policy and close dialog
data-protection.consent-description: Accept the app's privacy policy and close dialog
data-protection.title: Data Privacy

header.accessibility-back: Go back to the previous page
header.accessibility-session: Open the session menu. Here you can view the sessions you have attended or log out of your account.
header.really-delete-account: Do you want to irrevocably delete your account with all sessions? If you have given bonuses (yellow stars), export the questions so that you can check submitted bonus tokens.

home-page.accessibility-join-button: Enter the session with the specified session key.
home-page.exactly-8: A session key has exactly 8 digits.
home-page.accessibility-join-input: Here you can enter the  key of the session you want to join. Your lecturer will tell you the session key.
home-page.live-announcer: Welcome to fragpunktjetzt. To get information about key combinations press the Enter key or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
home-page.live-announcer-user: You are now on the user page. To get information about key combinations press the Enter key or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
home-page.no-room-found: No session found with this key
home-page.only-numbers: A session key only contains digits.
home-page.please-enter: Ask the lecturer for the key
home-page.room-name-input: Enter the name of the session you want to create here.

login.guest-login-tooltip: Created sessions will be deleted after logout. Sessions created with an account are saved for 180 days after the last visit.
login.login-description: Log in with the entered account data
login.login-tooltip: Sessions will be stored for 180 days.

overlay.cancel-description: Opens the web storage setting dialog
overlay.message: You have rejected the use of a web storage. Without it the app will not work.
overlay.title: Use not possible

password-reset.a11y-new_password2: Enter your new password here again
password-reset.a11y-password_reset_button: Sends a password reset key to the entered e-mail, with which a new password can be set.
password-reset.a11y-password_reset_key: Enter the password reset key you received by email here
password-reset.a11y-password_set_email: Enter your email address here to set a new password
password-reset.email-description: Enter your email address here to reset your password.
password-reset.new-password-successful: The new password has been set.
password-reset.reset-button-description: Resets the password of the account
password-reset.reset-successful: Password was reset. Please check your mails.
password-reset.set-button-description: Set the new password for the account
password-reset.set-new-password: Set a new password with the key code that was sent to you:

register.email-description-repeat: Please enter your e-mail address again to ensure that you have not mistyped.
register.password-description: Enter the password you want to register with here.
register.password-description-repeat: Please enter the password you want to register with again to make sure that you have not mistyped it.
register.register-request-error: Something went wrong with the registration. Maybe you already made the account?
register.register-successful: Successfully registered. Please check your mails.

room-list.filter: Here you can filter your visited sessions.
room-list.join-message-template: Join the session {{session}} with code {{id}} and in the role {{role}}
room-list.no-room-history: You haven't joined any sessions yet.
room-list.session-history-1: Your session history contains one session.
room-list.session-history-label: Below you will find a list of your attended sessions.

user-activation.activation-key-input-description: Enter the activation key that you received by e-mail.
